1591200.name: Experience the Energy: Take the Tour
1591200.description: Put on a virtual reality headset and see what it is like to be on multiple worksites in the energy industry. You can experience conventional and automated drilling, SAGD, mining, processing, natural gas and liquids pipelines. Get up close and see the careers and leading-edge technologies that are transforming the Canadian energy industry.
1591200.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
